title: Dye wastewater treatment and membrane fouling in a moving bed-UV-photocatalytically modified membrane bioreactor
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00474D, Paper
Jing Luo, Tingxi Liu, Weiwei Chen, Caixia Dong, Jianguo Liu
A moving bed-UV-photocatalytically modified membrane bioreactor (MB-UVPMBR) system effectively removed organic matter, and the removal efficiency of Lanasol blue 3R (LB) reached 85.1%.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
